snippet: Commissioner Bud Selig dispatched two of his top advisers to Miami to ask the editor of a weekly newspaper to share documents that reportedly link a number of player to performance enhancers.
abstract: Miami New Times, local newspaper that broke story of star baseball players receiving performance enhancing drugs at South Florida anti-aging clinic, wrestles with whether or not to share evidence with Major League Baseball.

byline.original: By MICHAEL S. SCHMIDT and STEVE EDER

lead_paragraph: Commissioner Bud Selig dispatched two of his top advisers to Miami to ask the editor of a weekly newspaper to share documents that reportedly link a number of player to performance enhancers.

headline.seo: Miami New Times Wrestles With Whether to Help Baseball Officials
headline.main: Newspaper Wrestles With M.L.B.’s Request for Documents
headline.print_headline: Newspaper Wrestles With M.L.B.’s Request for Documents
